entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Rain mixed with snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h late in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
